· 2020-03-09 · # 数学

更新时间：2020/3/24

1.韦达定理

设复系数一元nnn次方程∑i=0naixi=0\sum\limits_{i=0}^n a_i{x^i}=0i=0∑n​ai​xi=0的根为x1,x2,⋯ ,xnx_1,x_2,\cdots,x_nx1​,x2​,⋯,xn​,则：

∑i=1nxi=−an−1an\sum_{i=1}^n x_i=-\dfrac{a_{n-1}}{a_n} i=1∑n​xi​=−an​an−1​​

∑xb1xb2⋯xbm=(−1)mama0\sum x_{b_1}x_{b_2}\cdots x_{b_m}=(-1)^m \dfrac{a_m}{a_0} ∑xb1​​xb2​​⋯xbm​​=(−1)ma0​am​​

∏i=1nxi=(−1)na0an\prod _{i=1}^n x_i=(-1)^n\dfrac{a_0}{a_n} i=1∏n​xi​=(−1)nan​a0​​

例题

设A,B,CA,B,CA,B,C为抛物线y=x2y=x^2y=x2上不同的点,R,R,R为△ABC\triangle ABC△ABC外接圆的半径,,,求RRR的取值范围...

解：设外接圆方程为

(x−a)2+(x2−b)2−R2=0,(x-a)^2+(x^2-b)^2-R^2=0, (x−a)2+(x2−b)2−R2=0,

即

x4+(1−2b)x2−2ax+a2+b2−R2=0,x^4+(1-2b)x^2-2ax+a^2+b^2-R^2=0, x4+(1−2b)x2−2ax+a2+b2−R2=0,

由题意知该一元四次方程有333个不等实根,,,因此必有444个实根,,,分别设为x1,x2,x3,x4x_1,x_2,x_3,x_4x1​,x2​,x3​,x4​,根据韦达定理,,,有

∑xi=0  ⟹  ∑xi2+2∑i≠jxixj=0,\sum x_i=0\implies \sum x_i^2+2\sum_{i\ne j}x_ix_j=0, ∑xi​=0⟹∑xi2​+2i​=j∑​xi​xj​=0,

再次利用韦达定理,,,有

2(2b−1)=−2∑i≠jxixj=∑xi2>4∣x1x2x3x4∣=4∣a2+b2−R2∣,2(2b-1)=-2\sum_{i \ne j}x_ix_j=\sum x_i^2>4\sqrt{|x_1x_2x_3x_4|}=4\sqrt{|a^2+b^2-R^2|}, 2(2b−1)=−2i​=j∑​xi​xj​=∑xi2​>4∣x1​x2​x3​x4​∣​=4∣a2+b2−R2∣​,

又因为2(2b−1)>0,2(2b-1)>0,2(2b−1)>0,从而

4(2b−1)2>16(a2+b2−R2)  ⟹  R2>a2+b−14>14  ⟹  R>12.4(2b-1)^2> 16(a^2+b^2-R^2)\implies R^2>a^2+b-\dfrac14>\dfrac 14\implies R>\dfrac 12. 4(2b−1)2>16(a2+b2−R2)⟹R2>a2+b−41​>41​⟹R>21​.

由此可得R∈(12,+∞).R\in \left( \dfrac12,+\infty \right).R∈(21​,+∞).

2.辅助角公式放缩

若M=asin⁡x+bcos⁡x,M=a\sin x+b\cos x,M=asinx+bcosx,则M⩽a2+b2.M\leqslant \sqrt{a^2+b^2}.M⩽a2+b2​.

例题

设两个半径分别为rrr和RRR的圆P,QP,QP,Q外切于点O,O,O,圆P,QP,QP,Q上分别有两点M,NM,NM,N,求△OMN\triangle {OMN}△OMN面积SSS的最大值...

解：设M(Rcos⁡α,R+Rsin⁡α),N(rcos⁡α,r+rsin⁡α),M(R\cos \alpha,R+R\sin\alpha),N(r\cos \alpha,r+r\sin\alpha),M(Rcosα,R+Rsinα),N(rcosα,r+rsinα),则

S=12∣Rrcos⁡α(1+sin⁡β)−Rrcos⁡β(1+sin⁡α)∣=Rr2∣cos⁡αsin⁡β−(1+sin⁡α)cos⁡β+cos⁡α∣⩽Rr2(cos⁡2α+(a+sin⁡α)2+∣cos⁡α∣)=Rr2((2+2sin⁡α)+1−sin⁡2α).\begin{aligned} S=&\dfrac{1}{2}\left|Rr\cos\alpha(1+\sin\beta)-Rr\cos\beta(1+\sin\alpha)\right|\\ =&\dfrac{Rr}{2}\left|\cos\alpha\sin\beta-(1+\sin\alpha)\cos\beta+\cos\alpha\right|\\ \leqslant&\dfrac{Rr}{2}\left(\sqrt{\cos^2\alpha+(a+\sin\alpha)^2}+|\cos\alpha| \right)\\ =&\dfrac{Rr}{2}\left(\sqrt{(2+2\sin\alpha)}+\sqrt{1-\sin^2\alpha} \right). \end{aligned} S==⩽=​21​∣Rrcosα(1+sinβ)−Rrcosβ(1+sinα)∣2Rr​∣cosαsinβ−(1+sinα)cosβ+cosα∣2Rr​(cos2α+(a+sinα)2​+∣cosα∣)2Rr​((2+2sinα)​+1−sin2α​).​

容易得到((2+2sin⁡α)+1−sin⁡2α)\left(\sqrt{(2+2\sin\alpha)}+\sqrt{1-\sin^2\alpha} \right)((2+2sinα)​+1−sin2α​)的最大值当且仅当sin⁡α=12\sin\alpha=\dfrac12sinα=21​时取到,,,为332.\dfrac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}.233​​.

所以SSS的最大值为33Rr4.\dfrac{3\sqrt{3}Rr}{4}.433​Rr​.

3.函数原型(一阶线性微分方程)

1)f′(x)+□f(x)⋯ ,1) f^\prime (x)+\Box f(x)\cdots,1)f′(x)+□f(x)⋯,

2)f′(x)+g′(x)f(x)⋯ ,2) f^\prime (x)+g^\prime (x) f(x)\cdots,2)f′(x)+g′(x)f(x)⋯,

3)[eg(x)f(x)]′eg(x)⋯ ,3) \dfrac{[e^{g(x)}f(x)]^\prime}{e^{g(x)}}\cdots,3)eg(x)[eg(x)f(x)]′​⋯,

4)4)4)求出f(x)f(x)f(x)或者直接解决问题...

补充 - 分部积分法

∫udv=uv−∫vdu.\int u\mathrm{d} v=uv-\int v\mathrm{d} u. ∫udv=uv−∫vdu.

证明较为简单,,,利用d(uv)=udv+vdu\mathrm{d}(uv)=u\mathrm{d}v+v\mathrm{d}ud(uv)=udv+vdu两侧同时积分并移项即得.
选择方式应遵循反对幂三指,,,否则反而会复杂化...

例1

∫xsin⁡xdx=−∫xd(cos⁡x)=−xcos⁡x+∫cos⁡xdx=−xcos⁡x+sin⁡x+C\int x\sin x\mathrm{d}x=-\int x \mathrm{d}(\cos x)=-x\cos x+\int \cos x\mathrm{d}x=-x\cos x+\sin x+C ∫xsinxdx=−∫xd(cosx)=−xcosx+∫cosxdx=−xcosx+sinx+C

例2

∫xexdx=∫xd(ex)=xex−∫exdx=xex−ex+C=(x−1)ex+C\int xe^x \mathrm{d}x=\int x\mathrm{d}(e^x)=xe^x-\int e^x\mathrm{d}x=xe^x-e^x+C=(x-1)e^x+C ∫xexdx=∫xd(ex)=xex−∫exdx=xex−ex+C=(x−1)ex+C

4.不动点法

对象：an+1=f(an)a_{n+1}=f(a_n)an+1​=f(an​)
迭代函数g(x)g(x)g(x)：g(x)=f(x)g(x)=f(x)g(x)=f(x)
不动点方程：x=f(x)x=f(x)x=f(x)
不动点α\alphaα：满足α=f(α)\alpha=f(\alpha)α=f(α)
不动点改造：an+1−α=f(an)−αa_{n+1}-\alpha=f(a_n)-\alphaan+1​−α=f(an​)−α
原理：当an=αa_n=\alphaan​=α时,f(an)−α=0,,f(a_n)-\alpha=0,,f(an​)−α=0,根据代数基本定理,f(an)=α,f(a_n)=\alpha,f(an​)=α必有因式an−α,a_n-\alpha,an​−α,因此可以写成an+1−α=(an−α)g(n)a_{n+1}-\alpha=(a_n-\alpha)g(n)an+1​−α=(an​−α)g(n)的形式,,,从而可能帮助我们进行化简.

例题1

已知an+1=3an+2an+2,a1=1,a_{n+1}=\dfrac{3a_n+2}{a_n+2},a_1=1,an+1​=an​+23an​+2​,a1​=1,求{an}\{a_n\}{an​}的通项公式...

解
迭代函数：f(x)=3x+2x+2,f(x)=\dfrac{3x+2}{x+2},f(x)=x+23x+2​,

不动点方程：x=3x+2x+2,x=\dfrac{3x+2}{x+2},x=x+23x+2​,

不动点：x=2x=2x=2与x=−1,x=-1,x=−1,

不动点改造：

an+1−2=(an−2)⋅(3−2)an+2,a_{n+1}-2=\dfrac{(a_n-2)\cdot(3-2)}{a_n+2}, an+1​−2=an​+2(an​−2)⋅(3−2)​,

an+1+1=(an+1)⋅(3+1)an+2,a_{n+1}+1=\dfrac{(a_n+1)\cdot(3+1)}{a_n+2}, an+1​+1=an​+2(an​+1)⋅(3+1)​,

两式相除得

an+1−2an+1+1=an−2an+1⋅14,\dfrac{a_{n+1}-2}{a_{n+1}+1}=\dfrac{a_n-2}{a_n+1}\cdot \dfrac14, an+1​+1an+1​−2​=an​+1an​−2​⋅41​,

∴{an−2an+1}\therefore \left\{ \dfrac{a_n-2}{a_n+1} \right\}∴{an​+1an​−2​}是以14\dfrac1441​为公比,a1−2a1+1=−12,\dfrac{a_1-2}{a_1+1}=-\dfrac12,a1​+1a1​−2​=−21​为首项的等比数列...

∴an−2an+1=−14n+1,\therefore \dfrac{a_n-2}{a_n+1}=-\dfrac1{4^{n+1}},∴an​+1an​−2​=−4n+11​,

∴an=3⋅4n+14n+1+1−1.\therefore a_n=\dfrac{3\cdot 4^{n+1}}{4^{n+1}+1}-1.∴an​=4n+1+13⋅4n+1​−1.

例题2

已知a1=1,anan+1=12n,a_1=1,a_na_{n+1}=\dfrac1{2^n},a1​=1,an​an+1​=2n1​,求{an}\{a_n\}{an​}的通项公式...

解：令bn=2n2an,b_n=2^\frac n2a_n,bn​=22n​an​,则b1=2,bnbn+1=2.b_1=\sqrt{2},b_nb_{n+1}=\sqrt{2}.b1​=2​,bn​bn+1​=2​.

迭代函数：f(x)=2xf(x)=\dfrac{\sqrt{2}}xf(x)=x2​​

不动点方程：x=2xx=\dfrac{\sqrt{2}}xx=x2​​

不动点：x=±24x=\pm\sqrt[4]{2}x=±42​

不动点改造：

bn+1+24=2+24bnbn,b_{n+1}+\sqrt[4]{2}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2}b_n}{b_n}, bn+1​+42​=bn​2​+42​bn​​,

bn+1−24=2−24bnbn,b_{n+1}-\sqrt[4]{2}=\dfrac{\sqrt{2}-\sqrt[4]{2}b_n}{b_n}, bn+1​−42​=bn​2​−42​bn​​,

两式相除得

bn+1+24bn+1−24=−bn+24bn−24,\dfrac{b_{n+1}+\sqrt[4]{2}}{b_{n+1}-\sqrt[4]{2}}=-\dfrac{b_n+\sqrt[4]{2}}{b_n-\sqrt[4]{2}}, bn+1​−42​bn+1​+42​​=−bn​−42​bn​+42​​,

∴{bn+24bn−24}\therefore \left\{\dfrac{b_n+\sqrt[4]{2}}{b_n-\sqrt[4]{2}}\right\}∴{bn​−42​bn​+42​​}是以−1-1−1为公比,2+242−24,\dfrac{\sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2}}{\sqrt{2}-\sqrt[4]{2}},2​−42​2​+42​​为首项的等比数列...

∴bn+24bn−24=(−1)n−12+242−24,\therefore \dfrac{b_n+\sqrt[4]{2}}{b_n-\sqrt[4]{2}}=(-1)^{n-1}\dfrac{\sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2}}{\sqrt{2}-\sqrt[4]{2}},∴bn​−42​bn​+42​​=(−1)n−12​−42​2​+42​​,

∴bn=224(2−24)(−1)n−1(2+24)−2+24+24,\therefore b_n=\dfrac{2\sqrt[4]{2}\left( \sqrt{2}-\sqrt[4]{2} \right)}{(-1)^{n-1}\left( \sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2} \right)-\sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2}}+\sqrt[4]{2},∴bn​=(−1)n−1(2​+42​)−2​+42​242​(2​−42​)​+42​,

∴an=bn2n2=(224(2−24)(−1)n−1(2+24)−2+24+24)2n2=2[−n+1−(−1)n2].\therefore a_n=\dfrac{b_n}{2^\frac n2}=\dfrac{\left(\dfrac{2\sqrt[4]{2}\left( \sqrt{2}-\sqrt[4]{2} \right)}{(-1)^{n-1}\left( \sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2} \right)-\sqrt{2}+\sqrt[4]{2}}+\sqrt[4]{2} \right)}{2^\frac n2}=\sqrt{2}^{\left[ -n+\frac{1-(-1)^n}{2} \right]}.∴an​=22n​bn​​=22n​((−1)n−1(2​+42​)−2​+42​242​(2​−42​)​+42​)​=2​[−n+21−(−1)n​].

事实上,,,分类讨论得到的式子结构最为简单

an={21−n,n为奇数,2−n,n为偶数.a_n=\left\{\begin{aligned}&\sqrt{2}^{1-n}&,n\text{为奇数},\\ &\sqrt{2}^{-n}&,n\text{为偶数}.\end{aligned}\right. an​=⎩⎨⎧​​2​1−n2​−n​,n为奇数,,n为偶数.​

5.欧拉公式

eix=cos⁡x+isin⁡xe^{ix}=\cos x+i\sin x eix=cosx+isinx

e−ix=cos⁡x−isin⁡xe^{-ix}=\cos x-i\sin x e−ix=cosx−isinx

两式相加减得

sin⁡x=eix−e−ix2i,cos⁡x=eix+e−ix2i,tan⁡x=eix−e−ixeix+e−ix.\sin x=\dfrac{e^{ix}-e^{-ix}}{2i},\cos x=\dfrac{e^{ix}+e^{-ix}}{2i},\tan x=\dfrac{e^{ix}-e^{-ix}}{e^{ix}+e^{-ix}}. sinx=2ieix−e−ix​,cosx=2ieix+e−ix​,tanx=eix+e−ixeix−e−ix​.

例题

求证：tan⁡410∘+tan⁡450∘+tan⁡470∘=59\tan^4 10^\circ+\tan^4 50^\circ+\tan^4 70^\circ=59tan410∘+tan450∘+tan470∘=59

∴\therefore∴原式得证...

6.外切曲线

题型归纳：已知f(x)=bf(x)=bf(x)=b有两实数解x1,x2,x_1,x_2,x1​,x2​,求证：∣x1−x2∣⩽C+b(1f′(m)−1f′(n))|x_1-x_2|\leqslant C+b\left( \dfrac{1}{f^\prime(m)}-\dfrac{1}{f^\prime(n)} \right)∣x1​−x2​∣⩽C+b(f′(m)1​−f′(n)1​)
本质：切线放缩
1)1)1)求函数的极值点,,,在给定区间上函数应具有同一凸凹性,,,
2)2)2)寻找符合条件的切点m,n,m,n,m,n,
3)3)3)构造函数g(x)g(x)g(x)以极值点为界进行放缩,,,
4)4)4)放缩说理

例题

(1)(1)(1)解： f′(x)=x2−2x−1ex.f^\prime(x)=\dfrac{x^2-2x-1}{e^x}.f′(x)=exx2−2x−1​.
由f(x0)=0f(x_0)=0f(x0​)=0解得x0=±1.x_0=\pm 1.x0​=±1.
∵f′(−1)=2e,f′(1)=−2e\because f^\prime(-1)=2e,f^\prime(1)=-\dfrac2e∵f′(−1)=2e,f′(1)=−e2​
∴\therefore∴在(−1,0)(-1,0)(−1,0)处切线：y=2e(x+1),y=2e(x+1),y=2e(x+1),

7.拉格朗日乘数法

题型归纳：已知g(x,y)=0,g(x,y)=0,g(x,y)=0,求f(x,y)f(x,y)f(x,y)的最大值或最小值...
1)1)1)构造函数F(x,y,λ)=f(x,y)+λg(x,y),F(x,y,\lambda)=f(x,y)+\lambda g(x,y),F(x,y,λ)=f(x,y)+λg(x,y),
2)2)2)解方程组

{∂F∂x=0∂F∂y=0∂F∂λ=0,\left\{\begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial x}&=0\\ \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial y}&=0\\ \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial \lambda}&=0 \end{aligned}\right., ⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​∂x∂F​∂y∂F​∂λ∂F​​=0=0=0​,

3)3)3)将解得的(x,y)(x,y)(x,y)代入f(x,y)f(x,y)f(x,y)求得值并进行比较即可得所求最大值或最小值...

例题

构造拉格朗日函数F(x,y,λ)=f(x,y)+λg(x,y)=x2+y2+λxy−3λ.F(x,y,\lambda)=f(x,y)+\lambda g(x,y)=\sqrt{x^2+y^2}+\lambda xy-3\lambda.F(x,y,λ)=f(x,y)+λg(x,y)=x2+y2​+λxy−3λ.
求偏导数：∂F∂x=xx2+y2+λy,∂F∂y=yx2+y2+λx,∂F∂λ=xy−3.\dfrac{\partial F}{\partial x}=\dfrac{x}{\sqrt{x^2+y^2}}+\lambda y,\dfrac{\partial F}{\partial y}=\dfrac{y}{\sqrt{x^2+y^2}}+\lambda x,\dfrac{\partial F}{\partial \lambda}=xy-3.∂x∂F​=x2+y2​x​+λy,∂y∂F​=x2+y2​y​+λx,∂λ∂F​=xy−3.

{∂F∂x=0∂F∂y=0∂F∂λ=0  ⟹  λ=±2.\left\{\begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial x}&=0\\ \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial y}&=0\\ \dfrac{\partial F}{\partial \lambda}&=0 \end{aligned}\right.\implies \lambda=\pm 2. ⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​∂x∂F​∂y∂F​∂λ∂F​​=0=0=0​⟹λ=±2.

显然负值舍去,,,容易得到min{f(x,y)}=f(±3,±3)=6.min\{f(x,y)\}=f(\pm\sqrt{3},\pm\sqrt{3})=\sqrt{6}.min{f(x,y)}=f(±3​,±3​)=6​.

8.泰勒公式(麦克劳林展开)

泰勒公式：任意一个连续函数f(x)f(x)f(x)可以写成

f(x)=∑i=0nf(n)(a)i!(x−a)i+Rn(x),f(x)=\sum\limits_{i=0}^n \dfrac{f^{(n)}(a)}{i!}(x-a)^i+R_n(x), f(x)=i=0∑n​i!f(n)(a)​(x−a)i+Rn​(x),

麦克劳林展开：泰勒公式取a=0a=0a=0的特例

f(x)=∑i=0nf(n)(0)i!xi+Rn(x).f(x)=\sum\limits_{i=0}^n \dfrac{f^{(n)}(0)}{i!}x^i+R_n(x). f(x)=i=0∑n​i!f(n)(0)​xi+Rn​(x).

(lim⁡n→∞Rn(x)=0)\left( \lim\limits_{n\to \infty} R_n(x)=0\right) (n→∞lim​Rn​(x)=0)

常用展开式

⊚ex=1+x+x22!+⋯+xnn!+o(xn)\circledcirc e^x=1+x+\dfrac{x^2}{2!}+\cdots+\dfrac{x^n}{n!}+o(x^n)⊚ex=1+x+2!x2​+⋯+n!xn​+o(xn)

⊚sin⁡x=x−x33!+x55!−x77!+⋯+(−1)nx2n+12n+1!+o(x2x+2)\circledcirc \sin x=x-\dfrac{x^3}{3!}+\dfrac{x^5}{5!}-\dfrac{x^7}{7!}+\cdots+(-1)^n\dfrac{x^{2n+1}}{2n+1!}+o(x^{2x+2})⊚sinx=x−3!x3​+5!x5​−7!x7​+⋯+(−1)n2n+1!x2n+1​+o(x2x+2)

⊚cos⁡x=1−x22!+x44!−x66!+⋯+(−1)nx2n2n!+o(x2x+1)\circledcirc \cos x=1-\dfrac{x^2}{2!}+\dfrac{x^4}{4!}-\dfrac{x^6}{6!}+\cdots+(-1)^n\dfrac{x^{2n}}{2n!}+o(x^{2x+1})⊚cosx=1−2!x2​+4!x4​−6!x6​+⋯+(−1)n2n!x2n​+o(x2x+1)

⊚ln⁡(1+x)=x−x22+x33−x44+⋯+(−1)n−1xnn+o(xn)\circledcirc \ln(1+x)=x-\dfrac{x^2}{2}+\dfrac{x^3}{3}-\dfrac{x^4}{4}+\cdots+(-1)^{n-1}\dfrac{x^n}{n}+o(x^n)⊚ln(1+x)=x−2x2​+3x3​−4x4​+⋯+(−1)n−1nxn​+o(xn)

由此可以进行一些常见放缩,,,此处不进行赘述...

9.极化恒等式

对任意两个平面向量a⃗\vec aa和b⃗,\vec b,b,均有4a⃗⋅b⃗=(a⃗+b⃗)2−(a⃗−b⃗)2.4\vec a\cdot\vec b=\left( \vec a+\vec b \right)^2-\left( \vec a-\vec b \right)^2.4a⋅b=(a+b)2−(a−b)2.

推导过程：
(a⃗+b⃗)2=a⃗2+2a⃗⋅b⃗+b⃗2,(a⃗−b⃗)2=a⃗2−2a⃗⋅b⃗+b⃗2.}  ⟹  两式相减4a⃗⋅b⃗=(a⃗+b⃗)2−(a⃗−b⃗)2\left. \begin{aligned}\left( \vec a+\vec b \right)^2=\vec{a}^2+2\vec a\cdot\vec b +\vec{b}^2,\\ \left( \vec a-\vec b \right)^2=\vec{a}^2-2\vec a\cdot\vec b +\vec{b}^2. \end{aligned}\right\}\stackrel{两式相减}{\implies}4\vec a\cdot\vec b=\left( \vec a+\vec b \right)^2-\left( \vec a-\vec b \right)^2(a+b)2=a2+2a⋅b+b2,(a−b)2=a2−2a⋅b+b2.​⎭⎪⎬⎪⎫​⟹两式相减​4a⋅b=(a+b)2−(a−b)2

实数版本：4ab=(a+b)2−(a−b)2.4ab=(a+b)^2-(a-b)^2.4ab=(a+b)2−(a−b)2.

常用形式：PA→⋅PB→=PM2−14AB2,\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=PM^2-\dfrac14AB^2,PA⋅PB=PM2−41​AB2,其中MMM为ABABAB中点...

例题

解：取BCBCBC中点D,D,D,则
LHS=PD2−14BC2+BC2=PD2+34BC2⩾4BC2+34BC2⩾23.\begin{aligned}LHS=&PD^2-\dfrac14BC^2+BC^2\\ =&PD^2+\dfrac34BC^2\\ \geqslant& \dfrac4{BC^2}+\dfrac34BC^2\\ \geqslant& 2\sqrt{3}. \end{aligned}LHS==⩾⩾​PD2−41​BC2+BC2PD2+43​BC2BC24​+43​BC223​.​
当且仅当PD⊥BCPD\perp BCPD⊥BC且BC=233BC=\dfrac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}BC=323​​时取等号...
∴m=23.\therefore m=2\sqrt{3}.∴m=23​.

10.三射线定理


如图10.110.110.1所示,PA,PB,PC,PA,PB,PC,PA,PB,PC分别是从点PPP出发的三条射线,,,设∠APC=θ1,∠BPC=θ2,∠APB=θ,PA,PC\angle APC=\theta_1,\angle BPC=\theta_2,\angle APB=\theta,PA,PC∠APC=θ1​,∠BPC=θ2​,∠APB=θ,PA,PC决定的平面记为α,PB,PC\alpha,PB,PCα,PB,PC决定的平面记为β,α,β\beta,\alpha,\betaβ,α,β形成的二面角记为φ,\varphi,φ,则有

cos⁡θ=cos⁡θ1cos⁡θ2+sin⁡θ1sin⁡θ2cos⁡φ.\cos\theta=\cos\theta_1\cos\theta_2+\sin\theta_1\sin\theta_2\cos\varphi. cosθ=cosθ1​cosθ2​+sinθ1​sinθ2​cosφ.

证明采用两次余弦定理即可,,,读者自证不难(笑)...

11.抛物线的几何平均

设抛物线y=2px(p>0),y=2px(p>0),y=2px(p>0),直线lll与抛物线交于P(x1,y1),Q(x2,y2),M(m,0),P(x_1,y_1),Q(x_2,y_2),M(m,0),P(x1​,y1​),Q(x2​,y2​),M(m,0),则x1x2=m2.x_1x_2=m^2.x1​x2​=m2.
证明比较简单：不妨设P(2pa2,2pa),Q(2pb2,2pb),P(2pa^2,2pa),Q(2pb^2,2pb),P(2pa2,2pa),Q(2pb2,2pb),利用MP→∥MQ→\overrightarrow{MP}\parallel\overrightarrow{MQ}MP∥MQ​容易得到

m=2pab2−2pa2ba−b=−2pab  ⟹  m2=4pa2b2=x1x2.m=\dfrac{2pab^2-2pa^2b}{a-b}=-2pab\implies m^2=4pa^2b^2=x_1x_2. m=a−b2pab2−2pa2b​=−2pab⟹m2=4pa2b2=x1​x2​.

对其开方,,,分类如下：
⊚\circledcirc⊚ 当P,QP,QP,Q位于xxx轴同侧时m=x1x2,m=\sqrt{x_1x_2},m=x1​x2​​,
⊚\circledcirc⊚ 当P,QP,QP,Q位于xxx轴异侧时m=−x1x2.m=-\sqrt{x_1x_2}.m=−x1​x2​​.

例题

已知抛物线x2=2yx^2=2yx2=2y的焦点为F,F,F,过点FFF的直线lll交抛物线于M,NM,NM,N两点,
(1)(1)(1)求OM→⋅ON→\overrightarrow{OM}\cdot\overrightarrow{ON}OM⋅ON的值,

解：(1)(1)(1)设M(2m,2m2),N(2n,2n2),M(2m,2m^2),N(2n,2n^2),M(2m,2m2),N(2n,2n2),根据抛物线的几何平均性质容易得到mn=−14,mn=-\dfrac14,mn=−41​,因此

OM→⋅ON→=4mn+4m2n2=−12+116=−716.\overrightarrow{OM}\cdot \overrightarrow{ON}=4mn+4m^2n^2=-\dfrac 12+\dfrac1{16}=-\dfrac 7{16}. OM⋅ON=4mn+4m2n2=−21​+161​=−167​.

(2)(2)(2)设P(2m+2nλ1+λ,2m2+2n2λ1+λ),P\left(\dfrac{2m+2n\lambda}{1+\lambda},\dfrac{2m^2+2n^2\lambda}{1+\lambda}\right),P(1+λ2m+2nλ​,1+λ2m2+2n2λ​),则四边形OMQNOMQNOMQN的面积

S=∣12∣2m−2n2m2−2n24m+4nλ1+λ4m2+4n2λ1+λ∣∣=∣4(m−n)1+λ∣1m+nm+nλm2+n2λ∣∣=∣4(m−n)1+λ⋅(−mn(1+λ))∣=12∣m−n∣.\begin{aligned} S=&\left|\dfrac 12\left|\begin{matrix} 2m-2n & 2m^2-2n^2\\ \dfrac{4m+4n\lambda}{1+\lambda}& \dfrac{4m^2+4n^2\lambda}{1+\lambda}\end{matrix}\right|\right|\\ =&\left|\dfrac{4(m-n)}{1+\lambda}\left|\begin{matrix} 1& m+n\\ m+n\lambda&m^2+n^2\lambda \end{matrix}\right|\right|\\ =&\left|\dfrac{4(m-n)}{1+\lambda}\cdot (-mn(1+\lambda))\right|\\ =&\dfrac12|m-n|. \end{aligned} S====​∣∣∣∣∣∣​21​∣∣∣∣∣∣​2m−2n1+λ4m+4nλ​​2m2−2n21+λ4m2+4n2λ​​∣∣∣∣∣∣​∣∣∣∣∣∣​∣∣∣∣​1+λ4(m−n)​∣∣∣∣​1m+nλ​m+nm2+n2λ​∣∣∣∣​∣∣∣∣​∣∣∣∣​1+λ4(m−n)​⋅(−mn(1+λ))∣∣∣∣​21​∣m−n∣.​

因此

S=12(∣m∣+18∣m∣)⩾24,S=\dfrac 12\left(|m|+\dfrac 1{8|m|}\right)\geqslant \dfrac{\sqrt 2}4, S=21​(∣m∣+8∣m∣1​)⩾42​​,

等号当且仅当∣m∣=122|m|=\dfrac{1}{2\sqrt 2}∣m∣=22​1​时取得,,,因此所求最小值为24.\dfrac{\sqrt{2}}4.42​​.

12.阿波罗尼斯圆

对于两点A,A′,A,A^\prime,A,A′,若点PPP满足PAPA′=常数λ(λ>0且λ≠1),\dfrac{PA}{PA^\prime}=\text{常数}\lambda(\lambda>0\text{且}\lambda \neq 1),PA′PA​=常数λ(λ>0且λ​=1),则PPP点的轨迹是圆...

阿波罗尼斯圆的性质：
⊚OA′,r,OA\circledcirc OA^\prime,r,OA⊚OA′,r,OA为公比为λ\lambdaλ的G.P,G.P,G.P,
⊚O,A′,A\circledcirc O,A^\prime,A⊚O,A′,A顺次共线,,,
⊚A,A′\circledcirc A,A^\prime⊚A,A′分别在圆外与圆内...

例题1

已知A(0,1),B(1,0),C(t,0),A(0,1),B(1,0),C(t,0),A(0,1),B(1,0),C(t,0),点DDD是直线ACACAC上的动点,,,若AD⩽2BDAD\leqslant 2BDAD⩽2BD恒成立,,,求最小正整数ttt的值...

解：由题意可知点DDD在某个阿波罗尼斯圆上或外部,AC,AC,AC与该圆相切或相离...设其圆心为点E,E,E,半径为r,r,r,
由阿波罗尼斯圆的性质可得

EAr=rEB=2,\dfrac{EA}{r}=\dfrac{r}{EB}=2, rEA​=EBr​=2,

即

EA=2r,EB=12r.EA=2r,EB=\dfrac12r. EA=2r,EB=21​r.

∴AE→=−4EB→.\therefore \overrightarrow{AE}=-4\overrightarrow{EB}.∴AE=−4EB.

∴E(0−41−4,1−01−4),\therefore E\left( \dfrac{0-4}{1-4},\dfrac{1-0}{1-4} \right),∴E(1−40−4​,1−41−0​),

即E(43,−13).E\left( \dfrac 43,-\dfrac 13\right).E(34​,−31​).
由AB=EA−EBAB=EA-EBAB=EA−EB得2=2r−12r  ⟹  r=223.\sqrt{2}=2r-\dfrac 12 r\implies r=\dfrac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}.2​=2r−21​r⟹r=322​​.
即阿波罗尼斯圆方程为

E:(x−43)2+(y+13)2=89E:\left( x-\dfrac 43\right)^2+\left( y+\dfrac 13 \right)^2=\dfrac 89 E:(x−34​)2+(y+31​)2=98​

而AC:x+ty−t=0,AC:x+ty-t=0,AC:x+ty−t=0,可得

∣43+(−t3)−t∣1+t2⩾223⇔t2−4t+1⩾0.\dfrac{\left| \dfrac 43+\left(-\dfrac t3\right) -t \right|}{\sqrt{1+t^2}}\geqslant\dfrac {2\sqrt{2}}3\Leftrightarrow t^2-4t+1\geqslant 0. 1+t2​∣∣∣∣​34​+(−3t​)−t∣∣∣∣​​⩾322​​⇔t2−4t+1⩾0.

容易得到t=4.t=4.t=4.

例题2

在平面直角坐标系xOyxOyxOy中,,,已知点A(4,0),B(0,3),PA(4,0),B(0,3),PA(4,0),B(0,3),P为圆x2+y2=4x^2+y^2=4x2+y2=4上一动点,,,求3AP+2BP3AP+2BP3AP+2BP的最小值...

解：考虑到3AP+2BP=3(AP+23BP),3AP+2BP=3\left( AP+\dfrac 23BP \right),3AP+2BP=3(AP+32​BP),根据阿波罗尼斯圆的定义,,,设C(0,m),C(0,m),C(0,m),圆x2+y2=4x^2+y^2=4x2+y2=4是到点BBB和点CCC的距离之比为32\dfrac 3223​的点的轨迹,,,则23PB=PC.\dfrac 23PB=PC.32​PB=PC.
此时

OB2=2OC=32  ⟹  OC=43,\dfrac{OB}{2}=\dfrac{2}{OC}=\dfrac 32 \implies OC=\dfrac 43, 2OB​=OC2​=23​⟹OC=34​,

因此

3(AP+23BP)=3(PA+PC)⩾3AC=3⋅4103=410,3\left( AP+\dfrac23 BP \right)=3(PA+PC)\geqslant 3AC=3\cdot\dfrac{4\sqrt{10}}{3}=4\sqrt{10}, 3(AP+32​BP)=3(PA+PC)⩾3AC=3⋅3410​​=410​,

等号当且仅当A,P,CA,P,CA,P,C三点依次共线时取得,,,
∴\therefore∴所求最小值为410.4\sqrt{10}.410​.

13.仿射变换(伸缩变换)

对于椭圆

x2a2+y2b2=1,\dfrac {x^2}{a^2}+\dfrac {y^2}{b^2}=1, a2x2​+b2y2​=1,

令

{x=Xy=baY,\begin{cases} x=X\\y=\dfrac baY\end{cases}, ⎩⎨⎧​x=Xy=ab​Y​,

可以将椭圆转化成圆

X2+Y2=a2.X^2+Y^2=a^2. X2+Y2=a2.

变换后的各个量的关系如下：
⊚P(x0,y0)→P′(x0,aby0)\circledcirc P(x_0,y_0)\rightarrow P^\prime(x_0,\dfrac aby_0)⊚P(x0​,y0​)→P′(x0​,ba​y0​)

⊚k→k′=abk\circledcirc k\rightarrow k^\prime=\dfrac abk⊚k→k′=ba​k

⊚S→S′=abS\circledcirc S\rightarrow S^\prime=\dfrac abS⊚S→S′=ba​S

⊚l→l′=1+a2b2⋅k21+k2l\circledcirc l\rightarrow l^\prime=\dfrac{\sqrt{1+\frac{a^2}{b^2}\cdot k^2}}{\sqrt{1+k^2}}l⊚l→l′=1+k2​1+b2a2​⋅k2​​l

作用：
用仿射变换处理面积相关的问题 利用仿射变换可以将椭圆内接三角形变成圆内接三角形,,,它们的面积之间存在固定的比例关系,,,而求解圆内接三角形的面积运算量要低很多...
利用仿射变换转化条件或结论 利用仿射变换可以将一些题目中平凡的条件转化为对解题很有利的特殊条件,,,比如：利用仿射变换可以改变斜率,,,从而可以使得某些与椭圆相关的平行四边形转化成矩形,,,达到简化问题的目的;;; 利用仿射变换可以将椭圆变成圆,,,从而可以使得某些与椭圆相关的平行四边形转化为菱形,,,达到简化问题的目的...

例题

已知椭圆C1:x22+y2=1,C_1:\dfrac {x^2}{2}+y^2=1,C1​:2x2​+y2=1,过椭圆C1C_1C1​上一点PPP作椭圆C1C_1C1​的切线l,Ol,Ol,O为坐标原点,,,
(1)(1)(1)当直线lll不与坐标轴垂直时,,,设直线lll的斜率为k,k,k,直线OPOPOP的斜率为kOP,k_{OP},kOP​,求证：k⋅kOPk\cdot k_{OP}k⋅kOP​为定值,,,
(2)(2)(2)设直线lll与椭圆C2:x24+y22=1C_2:\dfrac{x^2}4+\dfrac{y^2}2=1C2​:4x2​+2y2​=1相交于M,NM,NM,N两点,,,求∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣|MN|\cdot |OP|∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣的取值范围...

(1)(1)(1)证明：设P(x0,y0),P(x_0,y_0),P(x0​,y0​),则l:x0x2+y0y=1,l:\dfrac{x_0x}{2}+y_0y=1,l:2x0​x​+y0​y=1,于是

k⋅kOP=−x22y0⋅y0x0=−12,k\cdot k_{OP}=-\dfrac{x_2}{2y_0}\cdot \dfrac{y_0}{x_0}=-\dfrac 12, k⋅kOP​=−2y0​x2​​⋅x0​y0​​=−21​,

为定值...
(2)(2)(2)解：令X=x,Y=2y,X=x,Y=\sqrt{2}y,X=x,Y=2​y,则C1′:X2+Y2=2,C2′:X2+Y2=4.C^\prime_1:X^2+Y^2=2,C^\prime_2:X^2+Y^2=4.C1′​:X2+Y2=2,C2′​:X2+Y2=4.
⊚\circledcirc⊚ 当直线lll斜率不存在时,,,容易得到∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=22.|MN|\cdot |OP|=2\sqrt 2.∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=22​.
⊚\circledcirc⊚ 当直线lll斜率存在时,,,设直线lll的斜率为k,k,k,由(1)(1)(1)得直线OPOPOP的斜率kOP=−12k,k_{OP}=-\dfrac{1}{2k},kOP​=−2k1​,进而可得直线M′N′M^\prime N^\primeM′N′的斜率kM′N′=2k,k_{M^\prime N^\prime}=\sqrt{2}k,kM′N′​=2​k,直线O′P′O^\prime P^\primeO′P′的斜率kO′P′=−12k,k_{O^\prime P^\prime}=-\dfrac 1{\sqrt{2}k},kO′P′​=−2​k1​,因此可得

{∣MN∣∣M′N′∣=1+k21+(2k)2∣OP∣∣O′P′∣=1+(−12k)21+(−12k)2\begin{cases} \dfrac{|MN|}{|M'N'|}=\dfrac{\sqrt{1+k^2}}{\sqrt{1+\left(\sqrt 2k\right)^2}}\\ \dfrac{|OP|}{|O'P'|}=\dfrac{\sqrt{1+\left(-\dfrac1{2k}\right)^2}}{\sqrt{1+\left(-\dfrac{1}{\sqrt 2k}\right)^2}}\end{cases} ⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​∣M′N′∣∣MN∣​=1+(2​k)2​1+k2​​∣O′P′∣∣OP∣​=1+(−2​k1​)2​1+(−2k1​)2​​​

且∣O′P′∣|O^\prime P^\prime|∣O′P′∣为定值2,∣M′N′∣\sqrt{2},|M^\prime N^\prime|2​,∣M′N′∣为定值22,2\sqrt{2},22​,因此有

∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=(1+k2)(1+14k2)(1+2k2)(1+12k2)⋅22⋅2=22⋅1+141+k2+14k2,|MN|\cdot |OP|=\sqrt{\dfrac{(1+k^2)\left(1+\dfrac{1}{4k^2}\right)}{(1+2k^2)\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2k^2}\right)}}\cdot 2\sqrt 2\cdot \sqrt 2=2\sqrt 2\cdot\sqrt{1+\dfrac{\dfrac 14}{1+k^2+\dfrac{1}{4k^2}}}, ∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=(1+2k2)(1+2k21​)(1+k2)(1+4k21​)​​⋅22​⋅2​=22​⋅1+1+k2+4k21​41​​​,

容易得到当k2=12k^2=\dfrac 12k2=21​时,∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣,|MN|\cdot|OP|,∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣取得最大值3,3,3,
lim⁡k→∞∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=22,\lim\limits_{k\to\infty}|MN|\cdot|OP|=2\sqrt{2},k→∞lim​∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=22​,
即∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣∈(22,3].|MN|\cdot|OP|\in(2\sqrt{2},3].∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣∈(22​,3].

综上所述：∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣∈[22,3].|MN|\cdot|OP|\in[2\sqrt{2},3].∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣∈[22​,3].

补充 - 参数方程

仿射变换可以看作是参数方程的另一种表达形式,,,事实上参数方程往往也能起到简化问题的作用...

(利用参数方程解决上述例题) (2)解：设P(2cos⁡α,sin⁡α),P\left(\sqrt{2}\cos\alpha,\sin\alpha\right),P(2​cosα,sinα),
容易得到l:2cos⁡α2x+sin⁡αy=1,l:\dfrac{\sqrt{2}\cos\alpha}{2}x+\sin\alpha y=1,l:22​cosα​x+sinαy=1,
将其与C2C_2C2​参数方程联立容易得到

M(2cos⁡(α+π4),2sin⁡(α+π4)),N(2cos⁡(α−π4),2sin⁡(α−π4)).M\left(2\cos\left(\alpha+\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right),\sqrt{2}\sin\left(\alpha+\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right)\right),N\left(2\cos\left(\alpha-\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right),\sqrt{2}\sin\left(\alpha-\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right)\right). M(2cos(α+4π​),2​sin(α+4π​)),N(2cos(α−4π​),2​sin(α−4π​)).

因此可以得到

∣OP∣=1+cos⁡2α,|OP|=\sqrt{1+\cos^2\alpha}, ∣OP∣=1+cos2α​,

∣MN∣={2[cos⁡(α+π4)−cos⁡(α−π4)]}2+{2[sin⁡(α+π4)−sin⁡(α−π4)]}2=[2(−2sin⁡αsin⁡π4)]2+[2(2cos⁡αsin⁡π4)]2=21+sin⁡2α.\begin{aligned} |MN|=&\sqrt{\left\{ 2\left[ \cos\left(\alpha+\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right)-\cos\left(\alpha-\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right) \right]\right\}^2+\left\{ \sqrt{2}\left[ \sin\left(\alpha+\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right)-\sin\left(\alpha-\dfrac{\pi}{4}\right) \right]\right\}^2}\\ =&\sqrt{ \left[ 2\left( -2\sin\alpha\sin\dfrac{\pi}{4} \right) \right]^2+\left[ \sqrt{2}\left( 2\cos\alpha\sin\dfrac{\pi}{4} \right) \right]^2 }\\ =&2\sqrt{1+\sin^2\alpha}. \end{aligned} ∣MN∣===​{2[cos(α+4π​)−cos(α−4π​)]}2+{2​[sin(α+4π​)−sin(α−4π​)]}2​[2(−2sinαsin4π​)]2+[2​(2cosαsin4π​)]2​21+sin2α​.​

因此

∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=21+sin⁡2α2−sin⁡2α.|MN|\cdot|OP|=2\sqrt{1+\sin^2\alpha}\sqrt{2-\sin^2\alpha}. ∣MN∣⋅∣OP∣=21+sin2α​2−sin2α​.

令f(t)=21+t2−t(0⩽t⩽1),f(t)=2\sqrt{1+t}\sqrt{2-t}(0\leqslant t\leqslant 1),f(t)=21+t​2−t​(0⩽t⩽1),则f′(t)=1−2t1+t2−t.f^\prime(t)=\dfrac{1-2t}{\sqrt{1+t}\sqrt{2-t}}.f′(t)=1+t​2−t​1−2t​.
∴f(t)\therefore f(t)∴f(t)在(0,12)(0,\dfrac 12)(0,21​)上递增,,,在(12,1)(\dfrac 12,1)(21​,1)上递减...
而f(0)=f(1)=22,f(12)=3,f(0)=f(1)=2\sqrt{2},f(\dfrac 12)=3,f(0)=f(1)=22​,f(21​)=3,
因此所求取值范围为[22,3].[2\sqrt{2},3].[22​,3].
(P.SP.SP.S：有一说一这个参数方程解法真的帅)

14.三角函数公式总结

解答三角函数题应从三方面入手：角,,,名称,,,结构式...

基本公式

⊚sin⁡2x+cos⁡2x=1\circledcirc \sin^2x+\cos^2x=1 ⊚sin2x+cos2x=1

⊚sec⁡2x−tan⁡2x=1\circledcirc \sec^2x-\tan^2x=1 ⊚sec2x−tan2x=1

⊚tan⁡x=sin⁡xcos⁡x\circledcirc \tan x = \dfrac {\sin x}{\cos x} ⊚tanx=cosxsinx​

⊚sec⁡x=1cos⁡x\circledcirc \sec x=\dfrac 1{\cos x} ⊚secx=cosx1​

⊚csc⁡x=1sin⁡x\circledcirc \csc x=\dfrac 1{\sin x} ⊚cscx=sinx1​

⊚cot⁡x=1tan⁡x\circledcirc \cot x=\dfrac 1{\tan x} ⊚cotx=tanx1​

两角和差

⊚sin⁡(x+y)=sin⁡xcos⁡y+cos⁡xsin⁡y\circledcirc \sin(x+y)=\sin x\cos y+\cos x\sin y ⊚sin(x+y)=sinxcosy+cosxsiny

⊚sin⁡(x−y)=sin⁡xcos⁡y−cos⁡xsin⁡y\circledcirc \sin(x-y)=\sin x\cos y-\cos x\sin y ⊚sin(x−y)=sinxcosy−cosxsiny

⊚cos⁡(x+y)=cos⁡xcos⁡y−sin⁡xsin⁡y\circledcirc \cos(x+y)=\cos x\cos y-\sin x\sin y ⊚cos(x+y)=cosxcosy−sinxsiny

⊚cos⁡(x−y)=cos⁡xcos⁡y+sin⁡xsin⁡y\circledcirc \cos(x-y)=\cos x\cos y+\sin x\sin y ⊚cos(x−y)=cosxcosy+sinxsiny

⊚tan⁡(x+y)=tan⁡x+tan⁡y1−tan⁡xtan⁡y\circledcirc \tan(x+y)=\dfrac{\tan x+\tan y}{1-\tan x \tan y} ⊚tan(x+y)=1−tanxtanytanx+tany​

⊚tan⁡(x−y)=tan⁡x−tan⁡y1+tan⁡xtan⁡y\circledcirc \tan(x-y)=\dfrac{\tan x-\tan y}{1+\tan x \tan y} ⊚tan(x−y)=1+tanxtanytanx−tany​

倍角半角

⊚sin⁡x2=±1−cos⁡x2\circledcirc \sin\dfrac x2=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1-\cos x}2} ⊚sin2x​=±21−cosx​​

⊚cos⁡x2=±1+cos⁡x2\circledcirc \cos\dfrac x2=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1+\cos x}2} ⊚cos2x​=±21+cosx​​

⊚tan⁡x2=±1−cos⁡x1+cos⁡x=sin⁡x1+cos⁡x=1−cos⁡xsin⁡x\circledcirc \tan\dfrac x2=\pm\sqrt{\dfrac{1-\cos x}{1+\cos x}}=\dfrac{\sin x}{1+\cos x}=\dfrac{1-\cos x}{\sin x} ⊚tan2x​=±1+cosx1−cosx​​=1+cosxsinx​=sinx1−cosx​

⊚sin⁡2x=2sin⁡xcos⁡x\circledcirc \sin 2x=2\sin x\cos x ⊚sin2x=2sinxcosx

⊚cos⁡2x=cos⁡2x−sin⁡2x=2cos⁡2x−1=1−2sin⁡2x\circledcirc \cos 2x=\cos^2x-\sin^2x=2\cos^2x-1=1-2\sin^2x ⊚cos2x=cos2x−sin2x=2cos2x−1=1−2sin2x

⊚tan⁡2x=2tan⁡x1−tan⁡2x\circledcirc \tan 2x=\dfrac {2\tan x}{1-\tan^2 x} ⊚tan2x=1−tan2x2tanx​

⊚sin⁡3x=3sin⁡x−4sin⁡3x\circledcirc \sin 3x=3\sin x-4\sin^3x ⊚sin3x=3sinx−4sin3x

⊚cos⁡3x=4cos⁡3x−3cos⁡x\circledcirc \cos 3x=4\cos^3x-3\cos x ⊚cos3x=4cos3x−3cosx

⊚tan⁡3x=tan⁡xtan⁡(π3−x)tan⁡(π3+x)\circledcirc \tan 3x=\tan x\tan\left(\dfrac{\pi}3-x\right)\tan\left(\dfrac{\pi}3+x\right) ⊚tan3x=tanxtan(3π​−x)tan(3π​+x)

⊚cos⁡nx=∑i=0⌊n2⌋(−1)iCn2icos⁡n−2ixsin⁡2ix\circledcirc \cos nx=\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\left\lfloor \frac n2 \right\rfloor} (-1)^i \mathrm{C}^{2i}_n\cos^{n-2i}x\sin^{2i}x ⊚cosnx=i=0∑⌊2n​⌋​(−1)iCn2i​cosn−2ixsin2ix

⊚sin⁡nx=∑i=0⌊n−12⌋(−1)iCn2i+1cos⁡n−2i−1xsin⁡2i+1x\circledcirc \sin nx=\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\left\lfloor \frac {n-1}2 \right\rfloor} (-1)^i\mathrm{C}^{2i+1}_n \cos^{n-2i-1}x\sin^{2i+1}x ⊚sinnx=i=0∑⌊2n−1​⌋​(−1)iCn2i+1​cosn−2i−1xsin2i+1x

和差化积与积化和差

⊚sin⁡x+sin⁡y=2sin⁡x+y2cos⁡x−y2\circledcirc \sin x+\sin y=2\sin\dfrac{x+y}2\cos\dfrac{x-y}2 ⊚sinx+siny=2sin2x+y​cos2x−y​

⊚sin⁡x−sin⁡y=2cos⁡x+y2sin⁡x−y2\circledcirc \sin x-\sin y=2\cos\dfrac{x+y}2\sin\dfrac{x-y}2 ⊚sinx−siny=2cos2x+y​sin2x−y​

⊚cos⁡x+cos⁡y=2cos⁡x+y2cos⁡x−y2\circledcirc \cos x+\cos y=2\cos\dfrac{x+y}2\cos\dfrac{x-y}2 ⊚cosx+cosy=2cos2x+y​cos2x−y​

⊚cos⁡x−cos⁡y=−2cos⁡x+y2sin⁡x−y2\circledcirc \cos x-\cos y=-2\cos\dfrac{x+y}2\sin\dfrac{x-y}2 ⊚cosx−cosy=−2cos2x+y​sin2x−y​

⊚sin⁡xcos⁡y=sin⁡(x+y)+sin⁡(x−y)2\circledcirc \sin x\cos y=\dfrac{\sin(x+y)+\sin(x-y)}2 ⊚sinxcosy=2sin(x+y)+sin(x−y)​

⊚cos⁡xsin⁡y=sin⁡(x+y)−sin⁡(x−y)2\circledcirc \cos x\sin y=\dfrac{\sin(x+y)-\sin(x-y)}2 ⊚cosxsiny=2sin(x+y)−sin(x−y)​

⊚cos⁡xcos⁡y=cos⁡(x+y)+cos⁡(x−y)2\circledcirc \cos x\cos y=\dfrac{\cos(x+y)+\cos(x-y)}2 ⊚cosxcosy=2cos(x+y)+cos(x−y)​

⊚sin⁡xsin⁡y=cos⁡(x+y)−cos⁡(x−y)2\circledcirc \sin x\sin y=\dfrac{\cos(x+y)-\cos(x-y)}2 ⊚sinxsiny=2cos(x+y)−cos(x−y)​

以上所有公式均可通过欧拉公式证明\text{以上所有公式均可通过欧拉公式证明} 以上所有公式均可通过欧拉公式证明

指数幂

sin⁡nx=12n∑i=0n(−1)iCnicos⁡((2i−n)x+nπ2)\sin^nx=\dfrac1{2^n}\sum\limits_{i=0}^n(-1)^i\mathrm{C}^i_n\cos\left((2i-n)x+\dfrac{n\pi}2\right) sinnx=2n1​i=0∑n​(−1)iCni​cos((2i−n)x+2nπ​)

cos⁡nx=12n∑i=0nCnicos⁡(2i−n)x\cos^nx=\dfrac1{2^n}\sum\limits_{i=0}^n\mathrm{C}^i_n\cos(2i-n)x cosnx=2n1​i=0∑n​Cni​cos(2i−n)x

这两个公式可以通过复变函数与二项式定理结合余弦函数的奇偶性证明\text{这两个公式可以通过复变函数与二项式定理结合余弦函数的奇偶性证明} 这两个公式可以通过复变函数与二项式定理结合余弦函数的奇偶性证明

15.均值不等式

对于各项均为正实数的数列{xn},\{x_n\},{xn​},有

min⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}⩽Hn⩽Gn⩽An⩽Qn⩽max⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}\min_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n}\{x_n\} \leqslant H_n\leqslant G_n\leqslant A_n \leqslant Q_n\leqslant \max_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n} \{x_n\} 1⩽i⩽nmin​{xn​}⩽Hn​⩽Gn​⩽An​⩽Qn​⩽1⩽i⩽nmax​{xn​}

调和平均⩽几何平均⩽算数平均⩽平方平均\text{调和平均}\leqslant\text{几何平均}\leqslant\text{算数平均}\leqslant\text{平方平均} 调和平均⩽几何平均⩽算数平均⩽平方平均

(Hn=n∑i=1n1x1,Gn=∏i=1nxi2n,An=∑i=1nxin,Qn=∑i=1nxi2n)\left( H_n=\dfrac{n}{\sum\limits_{i=1}^n \dfrac{1}{x_1}}, G_n=\sqrt[n]{\prod\limits_{i=1}^n x^2_i}, A_n=\dfrac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^n x_i}{n}, Q_n=\sqrt{\dfrac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^n x^2_i}{n}} \right)⎝⎜⎜⎜⎛​Hn​=i=1∑n​x1​1​n​,Gn​=ni=1∏n​xi2​​,An​=ni=1∑n​xi​​,Qn​=ni=1∑n​xi2​​​⎠⎟⎟⎟⎞​

证明：
构造函数

F(t)=(∑i=1nxitn)1t,F(t)=\left(\dfrac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^n x^t_i}{n}\right)^{\frac 1t}, F(t)=⎝⎜⎜⎛​ni=1∑n​xit​​⎠⎟⎟⎞​t1​,

由复合函数的单调性可知F(t)F(t)F(t)是R\mathbb{R}R上的连续单调增函数...
注意到

lim⁡t→−∞F(t)=min⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}\lim\limits_{t\to-\infty}F(t)=\min_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n}\{x_n\} t→−∞lim​F(t)=1⩽i⩽nmin​{xn​}

lim⁡t→+∞F(t)=max⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}\lim\limits_{t\to+\infty}F(t)=\max_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n}\{x_n\} t→+∞lim​F(t)=1⩽i⩽nmax​{xn​}

F(−1)=Hn,F(0)=Gn,F(1)=An,F(2)=QnF(-1)=H_n,F(0)=G_n,F(1)=A_n,F(2)=Q_n F(−1)=Hn​,F(0)=Gn​,F(1)=An​,F(2)=Qn​

因此可得

min⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}⩽Hn⩽Gn⩽An⩽Qn⩽max⁡1⩽i⩽n{xn}\min_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n}\{x_n\} \leqslant H_n\leqslant G_n\leqslant A_n \leqslant Q_n\leqslant \max_{1\leqslant i\leqslant n} \{x_n\} 1⩽i⩽nmin​{xn​}⩽Hn​⩽Gn​⩽An​⩽Qn​⩽1⩽i⩽nmax​{xn​}

17.二次曲线

总结一些与二次曲线有关的通用二级结论...

判断二次曲线的类型

一般地,,,对于曲线

F(x,y)=Ax2+Bxy+Cy2+Dx+Ey+F=0F(x,y)=Ax^2+Bxy+Cy^2+Dx+Ey+F=0 F(x,y)=Ax2+Bxy+Cy2+Dx+Ey+F=0

令Δ=B2−4AC,\Delta=B^2-4AC,Δ=B2−4AC,则

{Δ<0  ⟹  椭圆型Δ=0  ⟹  抛物型Δ>0  ⟹  双曲型\left\{ \begin{aligned} \Delta < 0 \implies \text{椭圆型} \\ \Delta = 0 \implies \text{抛物型} \\ \Delta > 0 \implies \text{双曲型} \end{aligned} \right. ⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​Δ<0⟹椭圆型Δ=0⟹抛物型Δ>0⟹双曲型​

但可能存在无轨迹,,,轨迹为一条直线和轨迹为相交直线的情况,,,需要注意判断...

二次曲线的切线方程

一般地,,,对于曲线

F(x,y)=Ax2+Bxy+Cy2+Dx+Ey+F=0F(x,y)=Ax^2+Bxy+Cy^2+Dx+Ey+F=0 F(x,y)=Ax2+Bxy+Cy2+Dx+Ey+F=0

上一点P(x0,y0),P(x_0,y_0),P(x0​,y0​),在该点切线的方程为

Ax0x+Bx0y+xy02+Cy0y+Dx0+x2+Ey0+y2+F=0Ax_0x+B\dfrac{x_0y+xy_0}{2}+Cy_0y+D\dfrac{x_0+x}{2}+E\dfrac{y_0+y}{2}+F=0 Ax0​x+B2x0​y+xy0​​+Cy0​y+D2x0​+x​+E2y0​+y​+F=0

证明

对方程求导数并整理可得(Bx+2Cy+E)y′=−(2Ax+By+D),(Bx+2Cy+E)y^\prime=-(2Ax+By+D),(Bx+2Cy+E)y′=−(2Ax+By+D),
因此所求切线方程y−y0=y′(x−x0),y-y_0=y^\prime(x-x_0),y−y0​=y′(x−x0​),
带入并化简整理得2Ax0x+B(x0y+xy0+Cy0y+D(x0+x)+E(y0+y)=2Ax02+2Bx0y0+2Cy02+2Dx0+2Ey0.2Ax_0x+B(x_0y+xy_0+Cy_0y+D(x_0+x)+E(y_0+y)=2Ax^2_0+2Bx_0y_0+2Cy^2_0+2Dx_0+2Ey_0.2Ax0​x+B(x0​y+xy0​+Cy0​y+D(x0​+x)+E(y0​+y)=2Ax02​+2Bx0​y0​+2Cy02​+2Dx0​+2Ey0​.
结合F(x0,y0)=0F(x_0,y_0)=0F(x0​,y0​)=0并整理可得切线方程

Ax0x+Bx0y+xy02+Cy0y+Dx0+x2+Ey0+y2+F=0.Ax_0x+B\dfrac{x_0y+xy_0}{2}+Cy_0y+D\dfrac{x_0+x}{2}+E\dfrac{y_0+y}{2}+F=0. Ax0​x+B2x0​y+xy0​​+Cy0​y+D2x0​+x​+E2y0​+y​+F=0.
